cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.7.0)

# add sources to the project
set (sources
     ${sources}
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/forward1.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/forward2.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/forward3.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/forward4.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/forward5.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/reverse1.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/reverse2.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/reverse3.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/reverse4.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/reverse5.hpp
     PARENT_SCOPE)
